# cook your code here
for _ in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    rec1x1, rec1y1, rec1x2, rec1y2 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    rec2x1, rec2y1, rec2x2, rec2y2 = map(int, raw_input().split())
    
    area1 = (rec1x2 - rec1x1) * (rec1y2 - rec1y1)
    area2 = (rec2x2 - rec2x1) * (rec2y2 - rec2y1)
    
    xint1 = max(rec1x1, rec2x1)
    xint2 = min(rec1x2, rec2x2)
    yint1 = max(rec1y1, rec2y1)
    yint2 = min(rec1y2, rec2y2)
    
    width = (xint2 - xint1)
    height = (yint2 - yint1)
    
    intersect = width * height
    
    if width > 0 and height > 0:
        print area1 + area2 - intersect
    else:
        print area1 + area2
